      • shards

        protected abstract GroupShardsIterator<ShardIterator> shards(ClusterState clusterState,
                                                             Request request,
                                                             java.lang.String[] concreteIndices)
        Determines the shards this operation will be executed on. The operation is executed once per shard iterator, typically on the first shard in it. If the operation fails, it will be retried on the next shard in the iterator.

      • checkGlobalBlock

        protected abstract ClusterBlockException checkGlobalBlock(ClusterState state,
                                                          Request request)
